snippet: BLANK--Robert. There was no better friend than Bob Blank. So kind, so generous, so smart--he was totally devoted to family and friends and the institutions that meant a great deal to him. We miss him tremendously and send much love to Nancy and the Blank and Chaikin families. The Aaron Family 1/3
lead_paragraph: BLANK--Robert. There was no better friend than Bob Blank. So kind, so generous, so smart--he was totally devoted to family and friends and the institutions that meant a great deal to him. We miss him tremendously and send much love to Nancy and the Blank and Chaikin families. The Aaron Family 1/3
